name: Rehearseal
description:
Introducing REHEARSEAL! 

Lucifer has opened a new taxi company, and you will be working for him... in exchange for your soul!

Drive around hell

As a part of Lucifer's team of taxi drivers, you were assigned your own mighty hearse. Take care of it, as you will pay for the damages with your soul!

Pick up customers

Pick up and drop off customers around hell. But beware, as being late will have dire consequences!

Get the highest score

Complete as many pick-ups as possible and reach the top of the leaderboard!

Controls

WASD - movement
Mouse - sign the contract and give your soul to Lucifer

Credits Paul Rauca
